title: Eucalyptus Potpourri
features: Add your own oil (included) to control scent level.
Enough oil for multiple “refreshings", depending on scent level.
Also comes with a pipette and a fixative, so scent lasts longer.
description: Our cool, bright Eucalyptus Potpourri blend can not only perk up a room, but also help to cheer you up. This is a 1 pound bag of potpourri. Scent-on-the-side lets you control how light or strong you want your potpourri to be, and we've included enough scented oil to keep your potpourri smelling great for far longer than most other potpourri brands you can buy. Instructions on applying the oil (and an oil dropper) are included with each order.
